Articles.Content:
One of Sesni's stories. Now with 100% less violence!

Credit : Rhynuix

LOC : ARTIFICIAL GRAVITY AREA, LAYTHE STATION

TIME : 2300

TRANSPONDER : UKN

STATUS : DEBRIEFING OF BATTLE OF LAYTHE

"Men, we've fought a hard battle. Almost destroyed the enemy, but their distress signals caught them surrendering. All POW's were immediately freed, and peace has been restored. Kenner and Fern got the bugs and mechs running for their lives, as well as our Duna fleet. Good job. We head to the Laythe City for hero worship, and terrible interviews. Crew carriers. Dismessed. Kurt, you too. The strategist can be on-station." Kater said. All of pilots and men who had duty on Laythe departed. Kurat walked up, so Kater, Kurat, and Kurt could depart to the officer's crew transporter. "Kurt, I think you were the bravest in the whole battle. You get to arrest those Fed troopers that killed the civvies in the science research vehicle."

"Well, that's that." Kurt said. "Just another exploded fleet. Let's move."

LOC : EELOO ORBIT

TIME : 0030

TRANSPONDER : UKN ARGO

STATUS : SETTING UP "BUG REPELLENT"

"Got the stuff that turns this thing off when bug repellent comes on stripped?" Kark said to Kenner.

"All out." Kenner said. "Just need to turn it on. Go head, Fern."

"Copy." Fern said, turnining the Bug Repellent on, which turns off any mantis ship that gets hit by the radio waves. The only way to strip out the things that react to it is by getting hit in a certain spot by a torpedo, then requires manual, in atmosphere work to strip it out. "Bug repellent on. No bugs coming in MY solar system."

"Great. Drop the transmitter out of the cargo bay." Kenner said. The transmitter slipped out of the cargo bay. It was called "Orbit Of Eeloo" to remind Kerbals of the great battle.

LOC : LAYTHE CITY

TIME :1243

TRANSPONDER : NONE

STATUS : HAVING A FEW DRINKS AT A BAR

"Good ol' times!" Kater said.

"I remember the days at the bar by the space center where we'd have a few drinks a couple days before launch." Kurat said.

"I've been on station more days than you boys have been on Pol for fun!" Kurt said.

"'Ey, some police officers want to buy me a few drinks for killing so many bugs and mechs. Mind if I go?" Kenner said.

"Yeah, go 'head." Kater said. "We'll be getting drunk so we don't have to do duties tomorrow." He said sarcastically.

Edited January 22, 2014 by Sesni
